sentences.sContent: the wail of the ambulance sirens
I heard police sirens in the distance.
sentences.sCn: 我听到了远处的警笛声。

synos.tran: [铁路][船]汽笛；迷人的女人；歌声动人的女歌手

words.tran: 陛下；大人；男性祖先；雄性亲畜

trans.tranCn: 汽笛, 警报器, 空袭警报, 妖妇
trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment that makes very loud warning sounds, used on police cars, fire engines etc
